translation.en: [officer 1, on radio] 3654. We have foot pursuit outside of PNC Park.
translation.zh: 3654 我们在PNC公园的外追捕嫌犯

translation.en: [officer 2] 3169, here on Stockton Avenue. Heading down.
translation.zh: 3169 我在斯托克顿大道 他下楼了

translation.en: [officer 3] 438972. Suspect description, black jacket, black pants.
translation.zh: 438972 嫌犯描述 黑夹克 黑裤子

translation.en: [officer 4] Mayor requests we lock down. Lock it down on all four corners.
translation.zh: 市长下令封锁 我再说一次 封锁建筑四角

translation.en: [officer 3] Copy.
[officer 5] Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
translation.zh: 嫌犯在逃 我再说一遍 嫌犯在逃

translation.en: [officer 6] Can we confirm present location of suspect?
translation.zh: 请确认嫌疑人现在的位置

translation.en: [officer 5] Got eyes on the suspect. Following.
[officer 7] Dispatch, 3227. Be advised, suspect is entering PNC Park.
translation.zh: 派遣 3227 请注意 嫌犯进入了PNC公园

translation.en: [officer 8] Suspect carrying backpack moving through PNC.
translation.zh: 不明身份的嫌犯 携带可疑背包在PNC公园穿行

translation.en: [officer 9] On the move!
[officer 10] Clear the area! Get out of my way!
translation.zh: 上面安排人手了吗？我在现场

translation.en: -[officer 11, on radio] I'm on-site. -[officer 12] Move!
translation.zh: 上面安排人手了吗？我在现场 让开！

translation.en: [officer 13, on radio] Unit One-Two. I got your call. Negative.
translation.zh: 这里是1-2小队 收到 没有发现

translation.en: We have no visual. We have got no ID at this time.
translation.zh: 我们没有看到嫌犯 不知道嫌犯身份

translation.en: [officer 14, on radio] Suspect is on the roof.
Officers in pursuit.
[officer 12] Ray!
Just come with me, okay?
I'm here to help.
It's over.
Just…
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
No, no, no, no!
[Ray, echoing] The past is like a dream.
-[birds singing] -[water flowing]
[Ray] There are memories that shape us,
molding us into what we've become.
A mosaic of images and feelings
translation.zh: 各种概念和感受的混合

translation.en: that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.zh: 揭示了我们命运的走向

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time.
translation.zh: 即使细节随时间流逝变得模糊

translation.en: -You know this is all yours? -[Young Rachel chuckles]
translation.zh: 这都是你的 知道吗？

translation.en: What ya lookin' at, man?
I'm lookin' at you, woman.
-I love you. -[Young Rachel] Love you too.
[Ray] As the years pass, we realize
translation.zh: 随着岁月流逝 我们发现

translation.en: we are nothing more than the experiences that made us.
translation.zh: 是那些经历塑造了我们

translation.en: -[doctor] Hi, Amanda. -Hi.
-[Ray] Doc. -[doctor] Mr. Cooper.
Is it back?
[doctor] Yes. We'll go over the options,
translation.zh: 是的 有几种治疗手段

translation.en: but Infirmam is still the most effective way to cure this type of cancer.
translation.zh: 但对于这类癌症的特效药还是因佛迈

translation.en: We've already leveraged everything.
[Ray] The pain has brought us closer together.
And watching her grow… has been to find myself again.
translation.zh: 看着她病情发展 也让我重新发掘自己

translation.en: [all] Surprise!
Here, mama. This is for you.
I mean, it's not much, but it's all they had at the gift shop.
translation.zh: 虽然不贵重 但礼品店只能买到这个

translation.en: -Oh. -[Amanda] Her name is Paloma.
translation.zh: -它叫帕洛玛 -妈妈 我很喜欢

translation.en: No, it's perfect. Thank you, Mom.
translation.zh: -它叫帕洛玛 -妈妈 我很喜欢 谢谢你 妈妈

translation.en: [Ray] But sometimes I wonder,
"Are these my memories,
or are they hers?"
-[Ray grunting] -[coach] Put your hips into it. Again.
-[Ray grunts] Ooh. -[laughs] Ooh, that was clean.
-Lock that wrist so it don't get weak. -It won't!
translation.zh: -手腕伸直 否则出拳没力 -不会的！

translation.en: There are no rules in a fight, people do not--
translation.zh: 战斗是没有规则的 没人会…

translation.en: -Whoa! -Fight fair!
-[both grunt] -[Ray] How do you win an unfair fight?
translation.zh: 你怎么能赢得不公平的战斗？

translation.en: -[Rachel] You always fight harder. -That's right.
[man] Let me train her, Coop. She's got what it takes.
translation.zh: 我来训练她 库珀 她有两下子

translation.en: -That's my sweet girl. -[laughs]
-[Rachel] Done. -Done?
Thank you, baby.
[Ray] Parents and their children.
Where do we stop and they begin?
translation.zh: 孩子是父母生命的延续

translation.en: Mr. Cooper. Ray.
-Doc. -I have good news.
We just got word
translation.zh: 我们刚获悉因佛迈的有效广谱版药剂

translation.en: a very effective generic version of Infirmam, called Spero,
translation.zh: 我们刚获悉因佛迈的有效广谱版药剂 斯派罗正处在 食品药监局的最后审核阶段

translation.en: is in the final stages of FDA approval.
translation.zh: 斯派罗正处在 食品药监局的最后审核阶段

translation.en: [softly] This is great news, Ray.
Did you do this?
-You did, didn't you? -[Rachel] What?
This was your birthday wish, wasn't it? [kisses]
I love you. Let's go tell Mom.
translation.zh: 我爱你 我们去告诉妈妈吧

translation.en: We were supposed to start a new medication.
You know when that's supposed to happen?
translation.zh: 你知道什么时候开始吗？

translation.en: I… You'll have to talk with Dr. Wu.
[Rachel] Dad, what's happening?
[Ray] Dr. Wu?
Dr. Wu!
-[Wu] Hi, Ray. -What's goin' on?
translation.zh: 嗨 雷 怎么回事？ 你说阿曼达很快就能用上斯佩罗了

translation.en: You said Amanda was gonna start Spero soon.
translation.zh: 怎么回事？ 你说阿曼达很快就能用上斯佩罗了

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Amanda's on my list of patients to see.
translation.zh: 我已将阿曼达列在等待名单上

translation.en: The company that makes the generic drug
translation.zh: 制造这种广谱药物的公司

translation.en: pulled it off the market.
What are you talkin' about?
BioPrime, the makers of Infirmam,
translation.zh: 制造因佛迈的公司拜欧普莱姆

translation.en: paid the manufacturer to delay Spero's release.
translation.zh: 付钱给生产商 推迟斯派罗上市

translation.en: -Delay? -For how long?
Indefinitely.
Ray.
You told me that my wife was gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 你跟我说我妻子会没事的

translation.en: I am delivering the same news to three other patients today…
translation.zh: 我今天也向其他三名患者 传达了这个消息

translation.en: [quietly] …two of them kids.
I am so sorry.
I'm sorry.
-[news fanfare plays] -[host] Welcome back. For those just joining, I'm here with BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.zh: 欢迎回来 观众朋友们 我们请到了 拜欧普莱姆的总裁西蒙基利先生

translation.en: and Congresswoman Diana Morgan of Pennsylvania.
translation.zh: 和宾夕法尼亚州议员戴安娜摩根女士

translation.en: Congresswoman Morgan, why are you here today?
translation.zh: 摩根议员 您参与本节目是为什么？

translation.en: Well, I've always taken a hard line against pharmaceutical lobbies
translation.zh: 我一向对药品游说 和拜欧普莱姆这类大型制药公司

translation.en: and mass corporations, like BioPrime.
With all due respect, Congresswoman,
BioPrime is unlike any other pharmaceutical company in the world.
translation.zh: 拜欧普莱姆 有别于世界上其他制药公司

translation.en: -[TV volume raises] -[Keeley] Our scientists have created
the most effective treatments in the fight against cancer.
translation.zh: 开发出了最有效的治疗癌症的方法

translation.en: Specifically with Infirmam, a drug that has increased life expectancy
translation.zh: 尤其是因佛迈 这种药物提高了

translation.en: in 86% of patients treated.
Mr. Keeley, it is not the efficacy that's in question.
translation.zh: 基利先生 我质疑的并非药效

translation.en: It's the business practices. It's the company's business practices.
I believe that we all have a basic human right
translation.zh: 我相信获得安全且负担得起的药物

translation.en: to safe, affordable medication.
Yeah. Um, this talking point of health care as a human right.
translation.zh: 你想从人权角度 探讨医疗问题

translation.en: Our medicines, they are a matter of research and science.
translation.zh: 我们的药品 是科学研究的产物

translation.en: The investment is not only risky, it is extremely expensive.
translation.zh: 我们承担的不仅是风险 还有高额的费用

translation.en: [Langley] All right. We have eager callers that wanna weigh in.
translation.zh: 好的 有观众来电 想要加入讨论

translation.en: [caller] Can you please explain? Because I just don't understand.
translation.zh: 能否请你解释一下？因为我无法理解

translation.en: It's crazy that a pill can cost that much.
translation.zh: 一颗药怎么能卖出这种天价

translation.en: -Yeah, this is, uh, a tricky issue. -[line ringing]
translation.zh: 对 定价的确是个难题

translation.en: Uh, and don't get fooled by the talking points
of… of politicians from Washington.
Mr. Keeley, according to your own internal documents,
translation.zh: 基利先生 根据你们的内部资料显示

translation.en: the cost of an entire course of treatment is only four dollars.
translation.zh: 整个疗程的成本只要四美元

translation.en: You're absolutely right. A… A course of treatment is four dollars.
translation.zh: 你说得对 一个疗程的成本确实是四美元

translation.en: But it's funny how you failed to mention the billions of dollars spent on…
translation.zh: 但你不能忽略 我们投入了数十亿美元在…

translation.en: -[operator] Your name? -Ray Cooper.
…rebates, discounts, insurance companies, wholesalers. Look,
translation.zh: 回扣、折扣、保险公司 零售商等方面 听我说

translation.en: I'm here because BioPrime
translation.zh: 我来到这里是因为拜欧普莱姆

translation.en: is committed to healing the world.
translation.zh: 致力于治愈全世界的患者

translation.en: And if you look at the numbers, that is exactly what we're doing.
translation.zh: 从数据上就能看出我们也是这样做的

translation.en: -[scoffs] That is not what you are doing. -All right.
Just to interject, our next caller is from Pittsburgh.
translation.zh: 接听来自匹兹堡的观众的电话

translation.en: Ray, do you have something to say to Mr. Keeley?
translation.zh: 雷 你有话要对基利先生说吗？

translation.en: My wife is dying in a hospital because you pulled Spero off the market.
translation.zh: 你们不让斯派罗上市 导致我老婆只能在医院里等死

translation.en: Paying competitors to shelve generic brands of drugs?
translation.zh: 付钱给竞争对手 阻止他们推出广谱药物

translation.en: [scoffs] That is immoral, Mr. Keeley.
translation.zh: 这种做法很缺德 基利先生

translation.en: Well… [clears throat]
Is it-- Should-- Can I? Uh, I just wanna talk to Ray directly.
translation.zh: 我能…我想直接跟雷对话

translation.en: Listen.
Uh, first of all, I'd just like to say I'm so sorry
translation.zh: 首先 对于你妻子的情况

translation.en: to hear about your wife.
Uh, believe it or not,
BioPrime is dedicated to saving lives.
translation.zh: 拜欧普莱姆都在以拯救生命为目标

translation.en: Saving lives? You're geared towards makin' a profit.
translation.zh: 拯救生命？你们一心想着赚钱

translation.en: We've already refinanced our house. I've taken every double shift I can get.
translation.zh: 我们抵押了房子 我在拼命加班赚钱

translation.en: You've already taken everything from me!
translation.zh: 你们让我变得一无所有！

translation.en: [Keeley] Ray, the sad reality is that cancer
translation.zh: 雷 很遗憾 癌症

translation.en: is still very often a death sentence.
In the short term, what would we give?
translation.zh: 在这么短的时间内 我们能做什么？

translation.en: [hesitates] What is the cost
of spending just a little bit more time with a loved one?
translation.zh: 多活一段日子 一年 一个月或者一天

translation.en: A year, a… a month, a day?
Mmm, it's impossible to put a price on.
If my wife dies,
it's your death sentence.
I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
translation.zh: 我会找到你 亲手杀了你

translation.en: [Rachel] Dad?
[weakly] What ya lookin' at, man?
[softly] I'm lookin' at you, woman.
Oh God!
[shouting] No!
Fuck, no!
Amanda, no!
[softly] Bye.
-[Ray] Ah, God damn it. -[Rachel] What? Hospital bill?
translation.zh: 该死 是什么？ 医院的账单吗？

translation.en: Just… put it at the bottom of the pile.
translation.zh: 塞在那堆不看的信底下

translation.en: -We can't ignore it. -[Rachel] Sure you can.
translation.zh: 我们不能无视 当然可以 我们投票支持全民医保

translation.en: -[stove clicks] -We voted for universal health care. Just…
translation.zh: 当然可以 我们投票支持全民医保 向他们表明我们的政治立场

translation.en: tell 'em we're taking a political stance.
translation.zh: 向他们表明我们的政治立场

translation.en: No, we are not eating that three nights in a row.
translation.zh: 不行 不能连续三晚吃那个

translation.en: -C'mon. You know you love this too. -[Ray] It's not happening.
translation.zh: 爸 你爱吃这个 不行 我们点些带蔬菜的东西吃

translation.en: We're gonna order something with vegetables.
translation.zh: 不行 我们点些带蔬菜的东西吃

translation.en: -[Rachel laughing] -Fries do not count.
-[Rachel] Hey! -No. Stop.
-Ah! Stop ticklin' me. -[cell phone vibrates]
[Ray chuckles] Stop it.
-Hello? -[man on phone] Ray Cooper?
My name is Martin Bennett. I'm a journalist for VICE.
translation.zh: 我叫马丁贝内特 是《罪恶》杂志的记者

translation.en: I'm doing a story on BioPrime, and I saw your call with Simon Keeley on TV.
translation.zh: 我在写一篇关于拜欧普莱姆的报道 我在电视上看到你和西蒙基利通话

translation.en: [Ray] What do you want?
I can help you get justice for what happened to your wife.
translation.zh: 我能帮你为你妻子的事讨回公道

translation.en: No, you can't. I've been down that road.
translation.zh: 你办不到 我尝试过了

translation.en: I have proof that crimes have been committed.
Crimes that can land some very powerful people in jail.
translation.zh: 这些罪行足以 将某些有权势的人送进监狱

translation.en: -Keeley? -Who's that?
Especially Keeley. We need to talk in person.
translation.zh: 基利首当其冲 我们得当面谈

translation.en: -You can talk now. Now you have me. -Not over the phone.
translation.zh: -你现在就说吧 我听着 -不能在电话里说

translation.en: Meet me at Gateway Station in 20 minutes. I won't waste your time.
translation.zh: 20分钟后在盖特威站见 我不会浪费你的时间

translation.en: -[call disconnects] -[Rachel] Who was that?
[Ray] I'll be right back.
What do you want? Chinese or Subway?
translation.zh: 你想吃什么？中餐还是赛百味？

translation.en: No, it's cool. I'll come with you, and we can pick it up on the way.
translation.zh: 没关系 我跟你一起去 顺路买饭吃

translation.en: Not gonna happen, Rae. Sit there and finish that homework.
translation.zh: 不行 你在家待着 把作业写完

translation.en: [Rachel] That's not fair.
Life's not fair.
Chinese?
Lock the door behind me.
-I love you. -Love you. [sighs]
[Ray] Excuse me.
Yeah, I'm here. Where are you?
translation.zh: 喂 我到了 你在哪里？

translation.en: -[Bennett] Get on the incoming train. -[Ray] You were supposed to meet me here.
Trust me, Ray. Just get on the train.
translation.zh: 相信我 雷 上车

translation.en: Are you on the train?
translation.zh: -你上车了吗？ -上了 现在要怎样？

translation.en: -Yeah. Now what? -Don't hang up. Just stay on the line.
translation.zh: -你上车了吗？ -上了 现在要怎样？ 别挂电话 保持通话

translation.en: Just sit tight.
Get off at this station.
Okay, where now?
There's a woman in a striped coat and a hipster guy with a scarf.
translation.zh: 有个穿条纹外套的女人 还有个戴围巾的男人

translation.en: -You see where they're headed? -Yeah. To street level.
translation.zh: -看到他们往哪边走了吗？ -出地铁站

translation.en: All right. There's a guy in a denim jacket going up the stairs.
translation.zh: 好 有个穿着牛仔夹克的人在上楼

translation.en: I want you to follow that guy. Hang back, but don't lose him.
translation.zh: 你跟着那家伙 别跟太紧 也别跟丢了

translation.en: Stand by.
Head to the south platform
translation.zh: 去南侧站台 搭乘开往阿勒格尼方向的红线地铁

translation.en: and take the Red Line towards Allegheny Station. Okay?
translation.zh: 去南侧站台 搭乘开往阿勒格尼方向的红线地铁 好吗？

translation.en: Stay on the line.
-Bennett? -Yeah. Martin.
translation.zh: -贝内特？ -对 很抱歉让你来回搭车 为了安全起见

translation.en: Look, sorry about all this train hopping, but it's just a precaution.
translation.zh: 很抱歉让你来回搭车 为了安全起见

translation.en: Okay, honestly,
I'm a little afraid of how deep this thing might go.
What does that mean?
I got a source who told me about BioPrime's payouts
translation.zh: 有线人告诉我 拜欧普莱姆付巨资

translation.en: to multiple offshore shell corporations.
Bribery, cover-ups, who knows what else. All this leads to Simon Keeley.
translation.zh: 贿赂、掩盖罪行 谁知道还有什么 这一切都指向西蒙基利

translation.en: There are other players at both the state and federal level.
translation.zh: 州政府和联邦政府都有人牵涉其中

translation.en: But recently, communication went silent.
You told me you had proof.
[Bennett] Enough to tie Keeley to bribes that pulled Spero off the market.
translation.zh: 我有足够信息证明基利通过行贿 阻止斯派罗投入市场

translation.en: But without my source, I can't connect the dots.
translation.zh: 但没有线人 我无法证明

translation.en: You're wastin' my time.
[Bennett] I have enough to bring public concern against BioPrime,
translation.zh: 我掌握足够资料 能引起公众的关注

translation.en: but I do not have enough to take them down.
That's why I need you, your story.
translation.zh: 所以我需要你 需要你的故事

translation.en: -I just-- -Look, just think about it.
Look, "Local family gets ravaged by Big Pharma's greed."
translation.zh: 以这个为题 “本地家庭被大型药企的贪婪摧毁”

translation.en: [Bennett] You gotta help me, Ray.
Family, human interest. That's what grabs headlines.
translation.zh: 家庭、人情 这些都能上头条

translation.en: We can blow this thing wide open.
We can take down BioPrime. We can bring Simon Keeley to his knees.
translation.zh: 我们可以扳倒拜欧普莱姆 战胜西蒙基利

translation.en: -Hey! -[blade swishes]
Dad!
Run!
Hey!
[groans] Rachel. Rachel, baby, are you okay? Look at me.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 宝贝 你没事吧？看看我

translation.en: -[coach] Just like your dad. -[Rachel grunting]
-Not about strength. -[both grunting]
Okay, top. Top. Up, up, up!
Hands up. Hands up. Move.
Again. Hit him again. Control him. Let's go.
translation.zh: 再一次 控制住他 上啊

translation.en: Come on. You can take anyone.
Beautiful. There it is.
Nice. Top, top, top, top! Watch the scramble.
translation.zh: 很好 压住！ 小心对方反攻

translation.en: All right.
Hooks in. Get it. Get him in. Here.
translation.zh: 钩住他 控制住对手

translation.en: Pick your shots.
That's it. Open him up.
translation.zh: 就这样 让他放松防守

translation.en: -[both grunt] -[coach] You got it. Lock it in.
Beautiful.
Just hold. Hold, hold.
[coach] He's tapping, Rachel.
Rachel, he's tapping.
-He's tapping, Rachel. Rachel! -[sounds fading]
translation.zh: 他拍地认输了 瑞秋！

translation.en: [coach] Rachel!
[coach] Rachel!
Today, I am thrilled to announce a bipartisan bill
translation.zh: 今天我很高兴 能宣布这项两党联合提案

translation.en: that will make true progress in the war to find a cure for cancer.
translation.zh: 这将在寻找癌症疗法的战争中 取得真正的进展

translation.en: In collaboration with the CDC and the NIH,
translation.zh: 我们跟疾病预防控制中心 和国家卫生研究院一起

translation.en: we are creating a strategic partnership
translation.zh: 与拜欧普莱姆药业建立了

translation.en: with BioPrime Pharmaceuticals.
Thanks to the effort of BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.zh: 多亏拜欧普莱姆药业的总裁西蒙基利

translation.en: and chairman, Vinod Shah,
translation.zh: 和董事长维诺德沙的努力

translation.en: this bill will effectively cap the cost of treatment.
translation.zh: 这项提案将有效控制治疗费用

translation.en: Finally, many of BioPrime's breakthrough treatments
translation.zh: 拜欧普莱姆药业许多曾经售价

translation.en: that used to cost in the hundreds of thousands of dollars
translation.zh: 高达数万美元的突破性疗法

translation.en: will now be available to the public at affordable prices.
translation.zh: 终于有了百姓负担得起的价格

translation.en: I told the American people that I would hold companies like BioPrime accountable,
translation.zh: 我曾许诺国人 要让拜欧普莱姆这样的企业负起责任

translation.en: and I have delivered on that promise.
We are cleaning out the rot.
[Ray] Again?
I wasn't watching it. You were.
I had a dream last night
about that trip we took with Mom in the woods.
translation.zh: 梦见那次跟妈妈一起在森林里旅行

translation.en: My memory's kind of fading of her.
translation.zh: 我对她的记忆有点变模糊

translation.en: I don't know. It's like I'm losing these tiny pieces of her every day, and I just…
translation.zh: 感觉每天我都会 忘记一点关于她的细节 我…

translation.en: I don't know. I miss her. I miss our family.
translation.zh: 我想她 想我们全家团圆的日子

translation.en: Me too.
I miss her too.
What are you planning to do?
I just need to make sense of this.
-I need to know. -Just… Just leave it alone, okay?
translation.zh: -我要知道真相 -别… 算了吧 好吗？

translation.en: They already investigated, and they didn't find anything.
translation.zh: 警方调查过 毫无线索

translation.en: Or the guy who tried to kill you.
translation.zh: 也没查出要杀你那人是谁

translation.en: It just was a dead-end conspiracy.
-I don't believe that. -[Rachel sighs]
You don't believe that.
I need to try.
Keep it close, Mike. -I don't know how long I'll be. -[Mike] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 车别停太远 不知道多久结束

translation.en: -Mr. Keeley. -Ah.
Appreciate it. -Don't let me go dry tonight, will you? -[server chuckles]
translation.zh: 谢谢 今晚要随时帮我续酒

translation.en: [announcer] Good evening. I'm proud to kick off this first annual event
translation.zh: 各位 晚上好 我很荣幸能在这次首届年度盛会上

translation.en: by introducing you to the CEO of BioPrime,
translation.zh: 为大家介绍拜欧普莱姆的总裁

translation.en: Mr. Simon Keeley.
[man] Nice to see you, Simon.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 西蒙

translation.en: Thank you.
Thank you very much. Hello, everyone.
T. S. Eliot said,
"We shall not cease in exploration."
We've joined forces with Goa Capital Partners
translation.zh: 我们联合果阿风投公司

translation.en: in hopes of raising ten million dollars…
translation.zh: 希望能筹集一千万善款…

translation.en: For-- That's right. I know you got it.
Excuse me.
[Keeley, over speakers] For medicine and assistance…
translation.zh: 为了非洲…印度 抱歉…

translation.en: for children in Africa.
translation.zh: （暂停使用） 儿童的医疗和救助

translation.en: India. Sorry. [laughs awkwardly]
Either way, both places need a lot of help.
translation.zh: 反正这两个地方都需要很多帮助

translation.en: -Thanks again for coming. -[guests clap]
Ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Simon Keeley.
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 掌声送给西蒙基利先生

translation.en: Simon, Simon, Simon.
India, Africa? Africa, India?
translation.zh: 印度 非洲？非洲 印度？

translation.en: You know what? I am so sick of doing your job for ya.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我受够了替你代劳

translation.en: I'm doing my job, Simon. Everyone's here because of me.
translation.zh: 我在发挥自己的能力 大家来这里都是因为我

translation.en: There's some important people here.
Might want to mingle with more than your cocktails.
Sure, all right. Good to see ya.
translation.zh: 好的 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -[drink spills] -What the fuck?
Who would…?
-[bodyguard 1] Sir? -[Keeley] You kidding? Give me a napkin.
translation.zh: -先生 -别愣着 把餐巾给我

translation.en: …why I agree to participate in this bullshit in the first place.
translation.zh: 我为什么要答应来参加这个破活动

translation.en: -[auctioneer] Let's start the auction. -Fucking balls are wet.
translation.zh: -先生们 拍卖开始 -裤子都湿了

translation.en: -[bodyguard 2] It's out of order. -No shit. How'd you figure that out?
translation.zh: -暂停使用了 -不会吧 大侦探 用你告诉我吗？

translation.en: Sir. Sir, there's another bathroom down the stairs.
translation.zh: 先生 楼下还有 一间盥洗室

translation.en: [Keeley] Well, let's go to it, then. All right?
Wait here. Keep a lookout.
translation.zh: 在这里等 保持警惕

translation.en: -[Ray] Hmm? -What the… fuck? You were warned.
If anything happened to her, I would hunt you down.
translation.zh: 如果她有三长两短 我不会放过你

translation.en: All made her suffer, but she died because of you.
translation.zh: 以及让她受苦的一切 她因你而死

translation.en: I didn't kill anyone, you psycho fuck. Cancer did.
translation.zh: 我没杀任何人 你这个疯子 是癌症

translation.en: You paid someone to kill Martin Bennett.
translation.zh: 你花钱请人去杀马丁贝内特

translation.en: -What? Martin? -He was investigating your bribes.
translation.zh: -什么？ -他当时在调查你行贿的事

translation.en: What the… What are you talking about? I don't know any Martin Bennett.
translation.zh: 你在说什么？我不认识马丁贝内特

translation.en: -You're the goddamn CEO of BioPrime. -All right.
translation.zh: -你是拜欧普莱姆的总裁 -好吧

translation.en: I authorize a bribe now and again, but it's not like I read the fine print.
translation.zh: 我偶尔会批准行贿 但我并不了解细节

translation.en: [yelling] Okay, now, stop! Stop!
Fuck!
All right. Uh… [grunts]
It must have been Vinod Shah. Okay?
translation.zh: 肯定是维诺德沙授意的 好吗？

translation.en: Nothing happens without his sign-off. He's the one that brought me on, okay?
translation.zh: 一切决策都要经他批准 我听命于他

translation.en: You have no idea what you're getting into.
translation.zh: 你不知道自己惹上了多大的麻烦

translation.en: -Get him. -[tense music playing]
Here. Handle it. Do it!
translation.zh: 给 干掉他 动手！

translation.en: -[blade slashes] -[bodyguard 2 screams] Fuck!
No!
Come here, you little bitch!
-[Ray exhales shakily] -[auctioneer] Sold! 50,000 dollars.
Rae?
Rachel.
Rachel.
[Rachel] Dad? You're hurt.
[Ray] I'm fine. I need you to pack up. Only what we need.
translation.zh: 我没事 赶快收拾东西 只带必需品

translation.en: -[Rachel] When are we coming back? -[Ray] We're not.
translation.zh: -我们什么时候回来？ -不回来了

translation.en: Is that his blood?
I… I had no choice. He had a gun.
translation.zh: 我别无选择 他有枪

translation.en: I told you not to do this.
People are gonna come after us, aren't they?
translation.zh: 我们要亡命天涯了 是吗？

translation.en: [Ray] I don't know.
But we need to go. Please go pack our stuff.
translation.zh: 总之得赶快走 去收拾东西

translation.en: [loudly] Go pack!
Mr. Asbury, I'm Special Agent Sarah Meeker.
translation.zh: 阿斯伯里先生 我是探员莎拉米克

translation.en: I already gave a statement.
[Meeker] Your partner, he took a bullet to the head tonight.
translation.zh: 你的搭档今晚头部中枪

translation.en: Did you hear any gunshots?
[Asbury] No.
Did you hear anything at all before losing consciousness?
translation.zh: 你在失去意识之前有听到什么吗？

translation.en: Somethin' about a woman.
Said, uh…
"All of them made her suffer."
translation.zh: “他们让她受苦” 也可能是…

translation.en: -Or… "All made her suffer." I don't know. -What do you mean? All what? All who?
translation.zh: -“让她受苦的一切” 我不确定 -一切什么？什么人？

translation.en: -I don't know. -Okay.
-Do you remember anything else? -No.
-[Asbury sighs] -Thank you.
Come on.
But wait.
Whoever it was said they warned him.
They said they'd come for Mr. Keeley if anything happened to the woman.
translation.zh: 他说如果那女人有三长两短 不会放过基利先生

translation.en: All right. Thank you.
Let's do a check on all death threats Keeley may have gotten in the past.
translation.zh: 调查基利过去受到的所有死亡威胁

translation.en: [agent] You got it.
[Ray] It's a long drive to Toronto on these back roads.
translation.zh: 通过这些小路开去多伦多会很久

translation.en: Especially if we're not talking.
-♪ Who throws the dice ♪ -You gonna come sit up here?
[Rachel grunts softly] Talk to Paloma.
We ran all the Keeley death threats, and we got a match.
translation.zh: 我们查过所有针对基利的死亡威胁 有结果了

translation.en: Her name is Amanda Cooper.
Died at Carnegie Medical a few years back.
translation.zh: 几年前在卡内基医院去世

translation.en: Her husband's Oldsmobile was at the auction.
translation.zh: 她丈夫的车在拍卖会附近出现过

translation.en: And we found this too.
[Keeley] It's impossible to put a price on.
[Ray] If my wife dies, it's your death sentence.
translation.zh: 我老婆死的时候就是你的死期

translation.en: I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
translation.zh: 我会找到你 亲手杀了你

translation.en: -[Langley] We're gonna take-- -[Meeker hits key] "All made her suffer"?
translation.zh: 我们需要… -“让她受苦的一切”？ -对

translation.en: -Right. [chuckles] -[Meeker exhales]
Let's put an APB out on Cooper's vehicle.
translation.zh: 对库珀的车发布全境通告

translation.en: [attendant] Here you are.
[man] Got the ID on the driver.
How do you wanna handle this?
[Ray] Evening.
[Ray] I'll be right up.
-[phone rings] -This is Meeker.
[Rachel] You're the agent assigned to what happened at the UNICEF fundraiser.
translation.zh: 你是负责筹款活动凶杀案的特工

translation.en: If you have any information, please call the tip line.
translation.zh: 如果你有任何线索 请打热线电话

translation.en: -An agent will get back to you. -Yeah, I called the tip line.
translation.zh: -会有专人给您回复 -我打了热线电话

translation.en: -I told them I'm only talkin' to you. -And who am I speaking to?
Simon Keeley's death was an accident.
translation.zh: 西蒙基利的死是个意外

translation.en: -It was self-defense. -How do you know that? Who is this?
translation.zh: 那是正当防卫 你怎么知道？ 你是谁？

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you everything that happened.
If you want a crime, look at…
translation.zh: 如果你想抓犯人 就去查…

translation.en: look at what Keeley did.
translation.zh: 去调查基利都干了什么

translation.en: How many cancer patients died because of him? Thousands? More?
translation.zh: 有多少癌症患者因他而死？ 几万或是更多？

translation.en: Where are you, Rachel?
-Goodbye. -Wait, I can help you.
My dad doesn't know I'm doing this.
translation.zh: 我爸不知道我给你打电话

translation.en: He's a good man. He… He just needs help.
translation.zh: 他是个好人 他只是需要帮助

translation.en: Do you need help?
I'm fine.
But I know you think he's guilty.
translation.zh: 但我知道你认为他有罪

translation.en: You've all made up your minds.
But you're wrong. He's a good, honest man.
translation.zh: 但你们错了 他是个正直的好人

translation.en: And I… need him.
He's all I got.
Do you have cash?
Why?
When you can, get to a… a gas station or a Walmart.
translation.zh: 可以的话 找一个加油站或者沃尔玛

translation.en: They have disposable phones, a burner.
Okay? You get one, and you call me back.
My number is 412-046-4378.
Okay? No one will be able to trace it. Okay? It's safe.
translation.zh: 没有人能追踪到 很安全

translation.en: Now say it back to me. It's 412-046-4--
-[call disconnects] -[quietly] Fuck.
Where'd you get that?
Did you steal that?
I'm just looking at it.
It's fine.
What? It's not like business is booming down there.
-Twenty dollars? Seriously? -[Rachel sighs]
We're not done.
Look, I know you've always taught me to do the right thing, okay?
translation.zh: 我知道你一直教我不能做坏事

translation.en: But we're here because of you.
translation.zh: 但我们沦落至此都是因为你

translation.en: Rachel, look at me. Look at me. We gotta go.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 看着我 我们得走了

translation.en: [Ray] Come on.
-[pounding on door] -[agent] FBI! We have permission to gain entry.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局！我们有权破门而入

translation.en: FBI!
[agent] Meeker.
Whoa. We definitely got our suspect.
translation.zh: 哇 这人绝对有嫌疑

translation.en: [Meeker] It's Torres.
You got something?
What?
Where'd this happen?
Yeah, okay. Thank you.
So, that APB we put out on Ray Cooper's vehicle?
translation.zh: 我们对雷库珀的车发布了全境通告

translation.en: It was spotted fleeing the scene of a double homicide 70 miles north of here.
translation.zh: 那辆车在70英里外被发现 现场还有两名死者

translation.en: Rae, I don't think I can make it to Toronto.
translation.zh: 瑞 我觉得我到不了多伦多

translation.en: You know those men were sent to kill us.
translation.zh: 你知道那些人是被派来杀我们的

translation.en: I had no choice.
I just hate this.
[man] It runs, if you're askin'.
Like an odds-on favorite at the Kentucky Derby.
translation.zh: 就像肯塔基赛马会上的热门赛马一样

translation.en: [hit man] You take cash?
[Ray] We need to stay off the road until I figure out what's goin' on.
translation.zh: 我们得驶离公路 我要看看现在什么情况

translation.en: I'm gonna look around.
You wanna come with me?
Okay.
I'll be right back.
If they found us at the motel, they'll find us anywhere.
translation.zh: 他们能在汽车旅馆找到我们 在任何地方都能找到我们

translation.en: It's gonna be okay, Rae. I'm gonna keep you safe.
translation.zh: 会没事的 瑞 我会保护你

translation.en: They're coming to hurt you.
That's why I need to stop this. It needs to finish.
translation.zh: 所以我必须阻止这一切 必须做个了结

translation.en: [Ray] I have to go after Shah.
[Rachel] You plan on using that?
No, but I need to be ready.
Do you know how to shoot it? It's not a hunting rifle.
translation.zh: 你知道怎么开枪吗？这个不是猎枪

translation.en: -[gun cocks] -You know I do, Rae.
So, what is your plan?
It's better to have it and not need it than need it and not have it.
translation.zh: 有备无患好过措手不及

translation.en: We need protection.
Okay, so all the values you taught me growing up
translation.zh: 好吧 我从小到大 你教的那些价值观

translation.en: are out the window?
As long as we're on the same page, dope.
translation.zh: 只要我们意见一致就好了

translation.en: Shit.
-[phone unlocks] -This is Meeker.
[Rachel] There are people that are coming after us. Rachel?
I don't know who. I don't know what he's gonna do, but…
translation.zh: 我不知道对方是谁 他要做什么……

translation.en: Who, your dad?
Look, I've been tryin' to stop him, but I can't.
translation.zh: 我一直想阻止他 但我做不到

translation.en: The only person he would ever listen to is my mom.
-Can you tell me about her? -She…
translation.zh: 你能跟我说说她的事吗？ 她…

translation.en: She was a dancer.
[sighs] She had, uh…
tendinitis and stress fractures.
My dad, I mean, he sparred with guys who could take a punch.
translation.zh: 我爸爸跟有实力的人练拳

translation.en: But you could tell that they were in pain. You saw it. You know?
translation.zh: 但对方很吃力 看得出来 你知道吧

translation.en: But when my mom danced,
she'd just smile.
She always smiled.
She's tough. Like you.
translation.zh: 她很强大 和你一样

translation.en: You don't know me.
Debate,
gymnastics, judo junior Olympian,
translation.zh: 体操、柔道少年组奥运选手

translation.en: a 3.5 GPA.
You've been checking up on me?
Well, I'm an FBI agent.
I do have one question.
Who is… Paloma?
How do you know about Paloma?
I'm looking at a photo that says "Rachel and Paloma."
translation.zh: 我正看着一张标注 瑞秋和帕洛玛的照片

translation.en: I… wanted a pet. [sighs]
But we couldn't get one because of my mom's treatments, so…
translation.zh: 但因为妈妈治病不能养

translation.en: so she got me a stuffed bunny.
translation.zh: 所以她给我买了一只毛绒兔

translation.en: Paloma.
You…
She was always, uh, looking out for me.
Even when she couldn't. [sighs]
You'd make her proud.
And your dad.
[breathing shakily] I don't know what he's gonna do.
Hey. Listen to me.
You are in control.
Um, but I'm… I'm not. I'm really not.
translation.zh: 可是我…我不行有 真的不行

translation.en: -You are in control. -Stop saying that.
You are in control. You are Rachel Cooper.
translation.zh: 你能控制自己 你是瑞秋库珀

translation.en: Say your name.
-Rachel Cooper. -Say it again.
Rachel Cooper. [sighs]
That's it.
Turn the ignition on.
What are you doin'?
-[clicks switch] -[Rachel] I'm coming with you.
[Ray] No, you're not.
-[Rachel] I'm not leaving you. -This isn't a debate.
-You can't do this without me. -I am not putting you in danger, Rae.
translation.zh: 你没有我不行 我不能让你陷入危险

translation.en: This conversation's over. Get outta the car.
What about the motel?
That was unplanned. Pump the gas.
translation.zh: 那不在计划中 踩油门

translation.en: Promise you'll be back. Promise.
translation.zh: 答应我 你会回来 答应我

translation.en: I'll be back.
Pinky swear.
I said, I promise.
Get outta the car.
Rae.
[sighs] You always say I have to fight harder, so…
translation.zh: 你总是激励我要努力战斗 所以…

translation.en: What?
[gently] I need you to get outta the car.
Get outta the car.
As long as we're together, we're still a family.
translation.zh: 只要我们在一起 我们还是一家人

translation.en: Okay? So if you can't promise me that we'll be together,
translation.zh: 如果你不能保证还会回来

translation.en: then I'm coming with you.
[Ray] Not this time.
[quietly] Put your seat belt on.
Nice house.
How you gonna get in there?
-I'm not. -[tense music playing]
Dad.
[Ray] What's this guy doin'?
[Rachel] Look.
[Shah] Okay. Keep an eye on your sister. See you at the airport.
translation.zh: 好 看好妹妹 我们在机场见

translation.en: Hold on.
This is Victor One. We've got a flat tire.
translation.zh: 这里是维克托一号 我们爆胎了

translation.en: Stay behind.
[Shah] What is this?
Something's wrong. Get us out of here.
translation.zh: 不对劲 我们离开这里

translation.en: Forward! Go! Go! Move, move!
Just break through it! Drive!
[driver] Come on! Let's go!
Fuck.
Get me out of here.
-Finish him. -[bodyguard] Go!
[Ray] Rachel, someone else is here. Stay in the car.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 有人来了 待在车里别动

translation.en: You're gonna tell me why Martin Bennett was killed.
translation.zh: 告诉我 马丁贝内特为什么被杀

translation.en: There's nowhere to go. We can get to anyone.
translation.zh: 你们无处可逃 我们能干掉任何人

translation.en: You killed a reporter to cover up bribes. Who were they paid out to?
translation.zh: 你为掩盖贿赂的罪行杀害记者 他们付钱给了谁？

translation.en: Soon, some powerful people are gonna be looking for a little girl who lost both her parents.
translation.zh: 有权势的人 将会追杀那个失去双亲的女孩

translation.en: [Rachel, echoing] Daddy!
-I know there's others. Who are they? -You don't have what it takes.
translation.zh: -我知道还有其他人 他们是谁？ -你没那个本事

translation.en: -[gunshot] -[Ray grunts] Whoa!
[Ray] Go!
Dad?
-[engine cuts out] -Why can't you just listen?
You should've stayed in the car. You shouldn't have followed me to the subway.
translation.zh: 你应该待在车里 不该跟着我去搭地铁

translation.en: That was the man from the subway.
We have to go.
Let's go.
Look.
-Hold on. -[Rachel] What are you doing?
[Ray, softly] Sit down.
If anything goes wrong, you tell them everything.
translation.zh: 如果出事 就把一切都告诉他们

translation.en: Your business with me is done.
Shah's dead.
Hmm. Shah didn't hire me.
My contract is to take out anyone who can implicate my employer.
translation.zh: 我合约的内容是 杀掉任何可能牵连我雇主的人

translation.en: Who else are you hunting?
Only the one sitting next to me.
Something for you, darling?
No.
I know your struggle.
I do.
The village I grew up in,
we were farmers.
I worked in the fields with my father.
translation.zh: 我和父亲一起在田里干活

translation.en: And one day, a group of rebels came.
translation.zh: 有一天 来了一群叛乱分子

translation.en: They slaughtered my entire village. Everyone. Whole family, friends.
translation.zh: 我们全村惨遭屠杀 所有人 亲人、朋友全死了

translation.en: I was able to hide in the weeds.
Now, you gotta understand, I was just a kid, know that?
In such pain, with such… rage
that for years, I hunted them one by one.
translation.zh: 愤怒 我花了多年时间 将他们一一斩杀

translation.en: -Then you understand. -[hit man] I do.
You see, what I've learned in that process
is that there will always be an opposing force.
translation.zh: 我在这一过程中发现 永远都会有反派

translation.en: No amount of revenge can change that.
translation.zh: 再怎样复仇都无法改变这一点

translation.en: So you see, in this case,
you are my village,
and I am the opposing force.
[clicks tongue] Well, there's three ways this goes down.
One, I tell those cops who we are
translation.zh: 第一种 我告诉警察我们的身份

translation.en: and this gets real ugly for both of us.
Two,
I walk out the front door,
spend the rest of my life hiding in the four corners of this earth,
and neither of us get what we want.
translation.zh: 我们两人都无法达到目的

translation.en: Or three,
you tell me who hired you.
translation.zh: 你告诉我 谁是你的雇主

translation.en: We both know I'm gonna go after them.
And when I do,
you can try to take another shot at me.
This way,
at least one of us gets what we want.
translation.zh: 我们中至少有一个能得偿所愿

translation.en: Nah.
No, you've killed a few men, but…
translation.zh: 不 你确实杀了几个人 但…

translation.en: their deaths are still fresh in your eyes.
translation.zh: 你对他们的死还记忆犹新

translation.en: You're a dilettante in my world.
translation.zh: 你对杀人掌握的还不够透彻

translation.en: I never set out to kill anyone.
Not like you.
You are not innocent.
You knew going after powerful people was a dangerous business.
translation.zh: 你知道向有权势的人寻仇很危险

translation.en: You jumped.
I'm just the pavement closing in.
translation.zh: 我只是你达到目的的捷径

translation.en: Diana Morgan.
The person you're looking for.
The senator.
See you in Pittsburgh.
Rachel.
I'll see ya soon.
Rothman, you have kids.
Does the idea of Rachel Cooper
being dragged through all of this bother you at all?
translation.zh: 被牵扯进来 你会不会觉得担心？

translation.en: Every case we work has me worried about my kids one way or another.
translation.zh: 只要牵涉到孩子的案件我都会担心

translation.en: I keep thinking about her.
I mean, how's…
how's a kid supposed to get past all that she's seen?
translation.zh: 经历这些的孩子 要怎么摆脱心理阴影？

translation.en: I feel like…
I feel like I need to protect her somehow.
-Just do the work-- -[agent] Memo came through.
-Search crew found Cooper's vehicle. -Where?
translation.zh: -搜查组找到了库珀的车 -哪里？

translation.en: [agent] In the woods, 20 miles outside Shah's compound.
translation.zh: 在树林里 距离沙家32公里处

translation.en: Looks like local PD got a call this morning
translation.zh: 当地警方今早接到报警

translation.en: that a tow truck was stolen at a nearby location.
translation.zh: 说那附近有一辆拖车被偷

translation.en: We need eyes on all street cameras on Route 8.
translation.zh: 让人盯着八号公路的监控

translation.en: -[agent] I'm on it. -Thank you.
Okay. Fort Pitt Tunnel. Only 12 minutes away.
translation.zh: 好 皮特堡隧道 还有12分钟的路程

translation.en: War room.
Hey, guys. We got a hit on that tow truck. It's headed back to the city.
translation.zh: 已发现那辆拖车的行踪 它在往回开

translation.en: [dispatcher 1, on radio] Suspect is in a red tow truck. 10-80.
translation.zh: 嫌犯驾驶一辆红色拖车 正在追捕

translation.en: License plate Romeo Tango One Seven
Uniform Alpha Sierra.
[officer 1] We may have something here. Westbound on Liberty passing 16th.
translation.zh: 发现目标 正延自由大道向西行驶 经过16号街

translation.en: [Rachel] The chopper! It's on us.
[officer 1] We've got eyes on the suspect. Making a right turn on 9th.
translation.zh: 已发现嫌犯 正在第九大街向右转

translation.en: North on 9th. Picking up speed. Making a run for it.
translation.zh: 在第九大街向北行驶 正加速逃跑

translation.en: All right. Hold on, baby.
[Rachel] Oh shit!
[officer 2, over speaker] Police! Stop the vehicle now!
-Where's the chopper? -It's on your right. On your right.
-Get outta the way! -[people scream]
Oh shit!
-God damn it! Hold on. Hang on! -[Rachel screams]
[dispatcher 1, on radio] All units, suspect is armed and dangerous.
translation.zh: 各小队 请注意 他有武器 非常危险

translation.en: I repeat, armed and dangerous.
translation.zh: 重复一遍 有武器 危险

translation.en: [Ray] The game's letting out.
[quietly] Oh shit!
-[dispatcher 2] Got eyes on the suspect. -[officer 3] On the move!
translation.zh: 发现嫌犯 嫌犯正在移动

translation.en: [officer 4, on radio] Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
translation.zh: 嫌犯在逃 我再说一遍 嫌犯在逃

translation.en: [dispatcher 2] Suspect is entering PNC Park.
-[Meeker] Everybody clear. FBI! -[Rothman] Move! Out of the way!
translation.zh: -让一让 联邦调查局！ -让一下！让开！

translation.en: [Meeker] If he's down here, we squeeze him out. I'll take the upper level.
translation.zh: 只要他在这里 我们就能把他找出来 我去上层

translation.en: PPD, cover this level. The rest, go upstairs.
translation.zh: 匹兹堡警方搜这层 其余人搜上面

translation.en: -[officer 5] Suspect spotted. -[crowd cheering]
Suspect spotted on the upper level.
Get me agents to the roof, now!
[Rothman] Move!
-[officer 7] I got eyes on. -[Rothman] Copy.
[Meeker] Wait!
Wait.
Okay. [gasps]
It wasn't right what happened to you. I understand that.
translation.zh: 你遭遇了不公 我知道

translation.en: Look, no one is gonna hurt you.
It's me. I'm here to help.
translation.zh: 是我 我是来帮你的

translation.en: Okay?
-[somber music playing] -I don't know you.
Yes, you do. We've…
We've been talking.
No. Paloma.
You told me your stuffed bunny's name was Paloma.
translation.zh: 你告诉我你的毛绒兔叫帕洛玛

translation.en: Remember?
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
[Meeker] Your father was a good man.
[Meeker] You are not him.
-[Meeker] Say your name. -[Rachel gasps]
[Meeker] You are in control.
[sighs] Fuck.
You're nothing but a scared little--
translation.zh: 你只是个惊慌失措的孩子

translation.en: [hit man] Rachel.
I'll see ya soon.
[echoing] Say your name.
[Ray, echoing] Rachel.
We're gonna be okay.
[Meeker] He shouldn't have been killed.
Come on, just… say… your name.
translation.zh: 听我的 说出… 你的名字

translation.en: [Meeker] Just say your name!
Rachel Cooper.
Yeah.
[dispatcher 2] We have a positive identification of the suspect. Her name is Rachel Cooper.
translation.zh: 我们已经确定嫌疑人的身份 名叫瑞秋库珀

translation.en: No. No, no, no, Rachel!
[Meeker] Her name is Rachel Cooper.
Eighteen years of age.
[paramedic] Any family to contact?
[Meeker] Both parents deceased.
[driver] No!
[Meeker] Rachel, stop!
There you are.
I'm scared.
I feel like the whole world's gone crazy.
translation.zh: 我觉得整个世界都疯了

translation.en: Or maybe it's just me.
I'm tired.
Nobody cares about stopping them.
Besides me.
Will I ever get to see you and Mom again?
translation.zh: 我能再见到你和妈妈吗？

translation.en: [softly] We're with you now.
[Morgan] The fight begins here.
Big business and corporate interests
have corroded our politics.
[Morgan] And I believe that our country is on the verge of imploding.
translation.zh: 我认为我们的国家正处在崩溃的边缘

translation.en: Of rotting. Rotting from the inside out.
translation.zh: 腐朽的边缘 从内而外的腐败

translation.en: [Morgan] We need someone who will clean…
[Morgan and crowd] …out the rot!
translation.zh: 我们需要有人来清除… -清除腐败！ -清除腐败！

translation.en: -Clean out the rot! -[crowd cheers]
Today, I am announcing my bid
to be your next senator
from the great state of Pennsylvania.
[chuckles] That's right.
And to big business politics,
translation.zh: 对于追求商业利益的政客们

translation.en: we have one thing to say.
This is our state,
and it is not for sale!
[staffer] Well done.
Entering the race is just the beginning.
Let's focus on what we wanna do when we win.
translation.zh: 我们要着重考虑的是成功后该做什么

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Ray] Where'd you get this?
-It's Mom's. -[Ray chuckles]
Actually, it's mine.
I took your mom to a Steelers game shortly after we met,
translation.zh: 我跟你妈妈认识不久时 带她去看钢人队的比赛

translation.en: and it was freezing, and I gave her my jacket.
translation.zh: 天很冷 我就把外套给她穿

translation.en: And she never gave it back.
Well, now it's my turn to steal it from her.
[Rachel] It's my turn to steal it from her.
[Ray] Come on, baby.
Get up.
[Ray, emphatically] Get up, sweet girl.
[Rachel] Calling the FBI.
And when they get here,
you're gonna tell them everything you did with BioPrime.
translation.zh: 我要你向他们坦白 你跟拜欧普莱姆之间的勾当

translation.en: Go ahead. Or better yet, let me.
translation.zh: 打吧 最好还是我来打

translation.en: I think the FBI is looking for you,
Rachel.
You know me?
You're all over the news.
I've seen what you did.
[Morgan] You bring the FBI here, and…
translation.zh: 你把联邦调查局的人找来

translation.en: who do you think they're gonna arrest?
-The crazy girl who killed five men? -No.
translation.zh: 杀了五个人的疯子？还是我？

translation.en: -[Morgan] Or me? -No. We never meant to hurt anyone.
translation.zh: 杀了五个人的疯子？还是我？ 不 我们从没想过要伤害任何人

translation.en: I understand, and I can help you.
translation.zh: 我明白 我可以帮你

translation.en: I think I'm the only one who can.
-I can make this nightmare end. -Shut up!
-You're the one behind BioPrime. -I wrestled them into submission.
translation.zh: -你是拜欧普莱姆的幕后主使 -是我迫使他们屈服

translation.en: I got them to lower their prices. Affordable treatment.
translation.zh: 我让他们降价 让百姓治得起病

translation.en: And you cleaned out the rot.
I'm fighting for you, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 我在为你而战 亲爱的

translation.en: When I saw you on CNN when my mom was in the hospital,
translation.zh: 我在电视上看到你时 我妈妈正在住院

translation.en: I thought you could actually save her.
I believed in you.
-[shakily] You still can. -How?
translation.zh: -你现在也可以相信我 -信你什么？

translation.en: [inhales sharply] I know people at the DOJ.
They can make the charges against you go away.
translation.zh: 他们可以取消对你的指控

translation.en: And you can have a life.
What you've been through, what happened to you, was wrong, Rachel.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 你本不该经历那些痛苦和悲剧

translation.en: The trauma you suffered.
Don't you think they'd want me to help you, sweetheart?
translation.zh: 你的父母应该也希望我能帮你吧？ 亲爱的

translation.en: -[gasps] -Stop calling me that. You're a liar.
translation.zh: 别这样称呼我！你是个骗子

translation.en: You were with BioPrime even then.
translation.zh: 你那时和拜欧普莱姆是一伙儿的

translation.en: You helped them take away
a cheap and lifesaving medication for my mom.
translation.zh: 能救我妈妈命的便宜的药

translation.en: I fought against them! [panting]
You took their bribe, and you gave them exclusive contracts.
translation.zh: 你收了他们的贿赂 让他们拥有独家经销权

translation.en: You're responsible for ordering the hit on Martin Bennett.
translation.zh: 你是谋杀马丁贝内特的主使

translation.en: You killed my dad.
[softly] Now tell the truth.
-[Morgan gasps] -[firmly] Tell me the truth.
Yeah.
I took the bribe.
I ordered the hit.
You don't understand anything. You're so young.
translation.zh: 你什么都不懂 你还太年轻

translation.en: The candidate with the most money wins.
translation.zh: 钱最多的候选人才能获胜

translation.en: That's how it works.
Was it worth it?
Was it worth it?
Security?
[yelling] Security!
She kills Keeley and runs. Tries to escape, but something or someone
translation.zh: 她杀了基利后跑了 企图逃跑 但为了某样东西或某个人 她又回来

translation.en: drove her back here, despite knowing she might be caught.
translation.zh: 但为了某样东西或某个人 她又回来 尽管知道自己可能会被抓

translation.en: [Rothman] Yeah, but she got her revenge. Why come back?
translation.zh: 但她已经报仇了 为什么要回来？

translation.en: -[agent] Just came in. -Thank you, sir.
-Holy shit. -[Meeker] What?
[Rothman] Rachel Cooper was spotted
translation.zh: 瑞秋库珀昨天下午在戴安娜摩根的

translation.en: at Diana Morgan's campaign rally yesterday afternoon.
translation.zh: 瑞秋库珀昨天下午在戴安娜摩根的 竞选活动上出现

translation.en: [Meeker] What was she doing there?
[reporter on TV] The fugitive from last night's assassination attempt…
translation.zh: 昨晚刺杀戴安娜摩根议员的犯人…

translation.en: [Rachel] Thanks.
…on Diana Morgan is still on the loose.
Pittsburgh police are asking anyone with information
translation.zh: 警方欢迎任何知情人士

translation.en: to please come forward.
[Rothman] First Keeley, then Shah, now a congresswoman?
translation.zh: 先是基利 然后是沙 这回是国会议员？

translation.en: It just seems so bizarre.
[Meeker] Rachel clearly knows something.
Let's go through Diana Morgan's campaign donations.
translation.zh: 调查一下戴安娜摩根的竞选捐款

translation.en: [Meeker] Look at this. Rachel Cooper just sent us something.
translation.zh: 你看 瑞秋库珀给我们发来的

translation.en: [Morgan on recording] I took the bribe. I ordered the hit.
translation.zh: 我收了贿赂 我雇了杀手

translation.en: The candidate with the most money wins.
translation.zh: 钱最多的候选人才能获胜

translation.en: That's how it works.
[reporter on TV] …developments in the assassination attempt.
translation.zh: …戴安娜摩根遇刺事件有了新进展

translation.en: According to sources, the FBI has arrested the congresswoman
translation.zh: 据悉 联邦调查局逮捕了这位议员

translation.en: regarding her connection to the recent murders of BioPrime executives
Simon Keeley and Vinod Shah
translation.zh: 西蒙基利、维诺德沙被杀

translation.en: and the two-year-old unsolved murders of Martin Bennett and Ray Cooper.
translation.zh: 以及两年前马丁贝内特 和雷库珀被害悬案有关

translation.en: Neither BioPrime or the FBI would comment on this ongoing investigation.
translation.zh: 案件正在调查 拜欧普莱姆 和联邦调查局均拒绝对此发表评论

translation.en: …Pennsylvania is allegedly connected to the deaths of reporter Martin Bennett
translation.zh: …宾州议员据称与两年前发生的 记者马丁贝内特

translation.en: and Rachel Cooper's father nearly two years ago.
translation.zh: 和瑞秋库珀父亲的被害案有关

translation.en: [Ray] The past is like a dream.
A mosaic of images and feelings
that offers some truth about how we got here,
even if details have blurred with time.
translation.zh: 即使细节随时间流逝变得模糊

translation.en: Parents and their children.
Where do we stop…
[Rachel] …and they begin?
